response.overview: This is an instructional guide introduced by HRH Prince Michael of Kent and features genealogists from the Society of Genealogists, Simon Garrett and Else Churchill. The DVD was released in 2006 (or July 2011, depending on the release/reprint date) and focuses on teaching the basics of family history research using records like Civil Registrations, Census returns, and Parish Registers.
response.title: Discover Your Family History
